name: Ninja vs Knights
description:
Made for WASM-4 Jam #2.

Can one single ninja take over an entire army of heavily equipped knights? The battle has been settled: let's fight!

Gameplay

This is an endless runner. The longer you play, the higher your score will be.

You can use your sword to fight against knights, disarm bombs and destroy the statues scattered around the area.

There are two different scoring systems: one is for distance, and the other is for coins you've collected along the way.

Controls

  • Left/Right: Move the ninja.
  • X /Spacebar: Jump. Hold it to jump higher.
  • Down: Drop to the ground.
  • Z: Attack. The sword can attack knights, bombs and statues.

You can also play via direct link.
